title: Are 35,000 Gulf War Soldiers Dead Due to Anthrax Vaccinations?
subtitle: A controversial film suggests that 35,000 servicemembers died from anthrax vaccinations, but we found no reasonable support for such a claim.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A government report from 2008 states that 35,000 veterans of the first Gulf War died as a direct result of adverse effects from an Anthrax vaccine they were mandated to receive.
